name: Library Card Hunt
description:
This is a short top-down RPG  style game that is modeled after the Mullica Hill Branch Library of the Gloucester County Library System. You are a new volunteer for the library that must search for 5 patron missing library cards. As you search, you can explore the library, speak with staff and learn about various services the library provides. 

Visit the Gloucester County Library System website at gcls.org

CONTROLS
Use the arrow keys to move your character, and the spacebar to talk to people and interact with objects. You can hold space while you move to run.
Press escape to bring up a menu to save your game.
